message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking to sell it to you for $150. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate the compromise, but $140 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I can see that we're getting closer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm getting close, but $135 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I'm starting to think we're in a bit of a stalemate here. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering the product to you for $137. Is this a price you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate the concession, but $137 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $132?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $137 and $132. How about we meet at $134.50?
I'm getting close, but $134.50 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $133?
